description: 5 x Apple Mac Pro with M2 Ultra and warranty or equivalent 5 x Apple 16-inch MacBook Pro with M3 Max chip and warranty or equivalent
full_summary:
### Apple Mac Pros and Apple 16-inch MacBook Pros with Warranty or Equivalent for Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada
#### Solicitation Number: BPM021334/26365

Published Date: April 23, 2024
Tender Closing Date: May 7, 2024, at 2:00 PM ET

#### Overview
Shared Services Canada invites qualified suppliers to bid on a procurement for 5 x Apple Mac Pro with M2 Ultra and warranty or equivalent, and 5 x Apple 16-inch MacBook Pro with M3 Max chip and warranty or equivalent. The requirement is for Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada.

#### Key Information

*   Deliverables: The procurement requires the delivery of 5 x Apple Mac Pro with M2 Ultra and warranty or equivalent, and 5 x Apple 16-inch MacBook Pro with M3 Max chip and warranty or equivalent.
*   Security Requirements: None
*   Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements: None
*   Contractual Requirements: The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
*   Bid Submission: Suppliers must submit their bids through the P2P portal for RFQ Submission.
*   Selection Criteria: The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries related to this solicitation, please contact:
Michael Boualavong
Procurement Officer
Shared Services Canada
99 Metcalfe Street, 11th Floor
Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 1E3
Telephone: (613) 402-8895
Email: michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca

#### Related Documents
The solicitation and other related documents can be accessed on the P2P portal for RFQ Submission. 

The following attachments are available for download:
*   Contracting Entity
*   End User Entities
*   Contact Information
*   Attachment
